Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple Microsoft Excel Vulnerabilities
text: Microsoft Excel could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system. By persuading a victim to open specially-crafted content, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system.
